## ChatEventClient interface

An event-driven client for processing user message and provide responses by emitting and listening to events.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ChatEventClient 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[emit(eventName, data)](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.emit.md)


</td><td>

Emits an event with the specified name and data, triggering all registered listeners for that event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getSession()](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.getsession.md)


</td><td>

Provide the current chat session.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[init(messageResponse)](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.init.md)


</td><td>

Initializes the client, using credentials and data in the provided message to setup a chat session.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[on(eventName, cb)](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.on.md)


</td><td>

Registers an event listener for a specified event. Supported events are: - `message`<!-- -->: A new message has been received. - `typing`<!-- -->: The agent is typing. - `close`<!-- -->: The chat session has been closed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[processMessage(request)](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.processmessage.md)


</td><td>

Processes a message request. The response should be emitted as a message event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[reinitializeSession(credentials)](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.reinitializesession.md)


</td><td>

Reinitialize the session using existing session data.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[resetSession()](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chateventclient.resetsession.md)


</td><td>

Reset the current chat session.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
